name: Vexrify
description: Vexrify is an administrative program made for VEX Robotics communities, providing user-friendly team authentication and Microsoft TrueSkill statistical analytics.

name: Skript Studio
description: Skript Studio is an online integrated development environment made for Skript with built-in syntax highlighting, syntax autocomplete, and obfuscator.

name: Tankon
description: Tankon is an online multiplayer tank minigame with round-based gameplay, featuring team deathmatch gamemode and scalable game servers.

name: FPS Unlock Updater
description: FPS Unlock Updater is a software updater program that automatically updates FPS Unlocker from axstin/rbxfpsunlocker, whenever a new version is found available on startup.

name: Skript Synchronizer
description: Skript Synchronizer is a Skript code watcher made to simplify the complex process of software development by synchronizing the remote and local working servers when code changes are applied.

name: Sladden FPS
description: Sladden is a first-person shooter minigame with optimized custom raycasting mechanism used for projectile calculations.
